page.title: 11Fetcham Area Farms
page.content: We have 10 farms in our area. Four of these are still working, two are stables and the remainder are private homes.{Slyfield}is the largest farm and many of the smaller farms belong to it. The farm is run by a tenant farmer. {Woodlands Farm}has 250 acres. Some barley is grown but most of the land is used to graze horses and cows. The horses are for the enjoyment of the owners only.{Woodlands Court Farm}has 75 acres. This is used to rear chickens and turkeys. {Sheepbell Farm}stopped being a working farm in 1975. It used to own cows and pigs. Now all that is left is the 17 century house. The 55 acres of{Pachesham Farm}is used as an equestrian centre.{Barracks {Farm}is still a working farm.
